mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTICE WHERE NT_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT A.*, B.EMP_NAME, C.JOB_NAME FROM NOTICE A JOIN EMPLOYEE B ON A.NT_EMP_NO= B.EMP_NO JOIN JOB_LEVEL C ON B.JOB_CODE = C.JOB_CODE WHERE NT_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY NT_NO DESC
SELECT A.*, B.EMP_NAME, C.JOB_NAME FROM NOTICE A JOIN EMPLOYEE B ON A.NT_EMP_NO= B.EMP_NO JOIN JOB_LEVEL C ON B.JOB_CODE = C.JOB_CODE WHERE NT_NO =#{bno}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTICE WHERE NT_STATUS = 'T' AND NT_EMP_NO = #{empNo}

SELECT A.*, B.EMP_NAME, C.JOB_NAME FROM NOTICE A JOIN EMPLOYEE B ON A.NT_EMP_NO= B.EMP_NO JOIN JOB_LEVEL C ON B.JOB_CODE = C.JOB_CODE WHERE NT_STATUS = 'T' AND NT_EMP_NO = #{empNo} ORDER BY NT_NO DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTICE A JOIN EMPLOYEE B ON (A.NT_EMP_NO=B.EMP_NO)
WHERE A.NT_STATUS ='Y'
WHERE A.NT_STATUS ='Y' AND B.EMP_NAME LIKE '%'||#{writer}||'%'
WHERE A.NT_STATUS ='Y' AND A.NT_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%'
WHERE A.NT_STATUS ='Y' AND A.NT_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{content}||'%'

SELECT A.NT_NO, A.NT_TITLE, A.NT_COUNT, A.NT_CREATEDATE, A.NT_STATUS, A.NT_EMP_NO, B.EMP_NAME, C.JOB_NAME FROM NOTICE A JOIN EMPLOYEE B ON A.NT_EMP_NO= B.EMP_NO JOIN JOB_LEVEL C ON B.JOB_CODE = C.JOB_CODE
AND A.NT_STATUS = 'Y'
AND B.EMP_NAME LIKE '%'||#{writer}||'%' AND A.NT_STATUS = 'Y'
AND A.NT_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%' AND A.NT_STATUS = 'Y'
AND A.NT_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{content}||'%' AND A.NT_STATUS = 'Y'
ORDER BY A.NT_NO DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTICE A JOIN EMPLOYEE B ON (A.NT_EMP_NO=B.EMP_NO)
WHERE A.NT_STATUS ='T'
WHERE A.NT_STATUS ='T' AND B.EMP_NAME LIKE '%'||#{writer}||'%'
WHERE A.NT_STATUS ='T' AND A.NT_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%'
WHERE A.NT_STATUS ='T' AND A.NT_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{content}||'%'

SELECT A.NT_NO, A.NT_TITLE, A.NT_COUNT, A.NT_CREATEDATE, A.NT_STATUS, A.NT_EMP_NO, B.EMP_NAME, C.JOB_NAME FROM NOTICE A JOIN EMPLOYEE B ON A.NT_EMP_NO= B.EMP_NO JOIN JOB_LEVEL C ON B.JOB_CODE = C.JOB_CODE
AND A.NT_STATUS = 'T'
AND B.EMP_NAME LIKE '%'||#{writer}||'%' AND A.NT_STATUS = 'T'
AND A.NT_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%' AND A.NT_STATUS = 'T'
AND A.NT_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{content}||'%' AND A.NT_STATUS = 'T'
ORDER BY A.NT_NO DESC
